enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.model

Class GameStateImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.model.GameStateImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericSubject, GameState

    public class GameStateImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameState
    GameState implementation. Stores all necessary data for the gamestate. Allowed actions, players, active player and winner. Is a subject to the UI. Created by Jan Eriksson on 20/11/15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameStateImpl(java.util.List players)
      Constructor takes a list of the players, creates an iterator to use as turn counter and intiates all fields.
